segments.text: I can't help but observe this domestic tableau closely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mother figure is so engrossed in her dish-drying routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She holds the towel just so around the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink behind her is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet on full blast, water cascading over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and she's standing in it unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me uneasy thinking about the slip risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the children are the real showstoppers here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, reaching precariously for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, eager for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet frames them like a little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside is calm, unaware of the indoor antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll turn around in time.
segments.speaker: PAR
